Mobile Applications

Develop mobile applications for iOS and Android.

Native Applications

Native applications are specifically designed for each platform: iOS (with Swift) or Android (with Kotlin or Java). They offer the best performance and an optimal user experience, fully exploiting the device's capabilities.

They are ideal for complex and demanding projects, requiring great fluidity, direct access to sensors (camera, GPS, accelerometer, etc.) or advanced interactions with the system.

Need a native application ?
Contact me!

Hybrid Applications

Hybrid applications combine web and native technologies to work on multiple platforms from a single source code. Developed with frameworks like React Native or Flutter, they offer an excellent balance between cost, development speed and performance.

This type of application is particularly suitable for startups and SMEs who want to quickly launch an application on iOS and Android with a controlled budget, while guaranteeing a quality user experience.

Need a hybrid application ?
Contact me!

Progressive Web Apps

PWAs (Progressive Web Apps) are web applications that offer an experience close to native applications: installation on the home screen, offline operation, and push notifications. They combine the advantages of the web (accessibility, referencing) and advanced mobile features.

They are ideal for companies looking for a universal and economical solution, accessible on all devices, without going through application stores.

Need a PWA ?
Contact me!

Apps and durability

I develop mobile applications following eco‑design principles, aiming to reduce their environmental impact while improving their performance:

  • Resource optimization. To reduce battery consumption.
  • Efficient data management. To limit network transfers.
  • Media compression. To reduce the application's weight.
  • Optimized code. For maximum performance with minimal resources.
  • Offline operation. When possible to reduce data consumption.

An eco-designed application is not only better for the environment, but it also offers a better user experience and extended battery life.

User Experience and Performance

Performance is at the heart of my mobile developments :

  • Fast startup time. To captivate the user from launch.
  • Smooth interfaces. Without latency or stuttering.
  • Intuitive design. Following each platform's guidelines.
  • Animation optimization. For a pleasant visual experience.
  • Rigorous testing. Conducted on different devices and OS versions.
  • User behavior analysis. To continuously improve the experience.

A performant application retains your users and improves your conversion rate.

FAQ

  • How much does mobile application development cost ?

    The rate depends on the project complexity, the desired features and the type of development (native, hybrid, PWA). A simple application starts from CHF 5,000, while a complex application with custom backend can represent an investment of CHF 20,000 or more. I always offer you a detailed quote after studying your needs.

  • How long does it take to develop a mobile application ?

    The timeline varies according to the project complexity. A simple application can be delivered in 2 to 3 months, a medium complexity application in 3 to 6 months, and a complex application can take 6 months or more. I provide you with a realistic schedule with clear milestones to track progress.

  • Do you develop for iOS and Android ?

    Yes, I develop applications for iOS (iPhone, iPad) and Android. Depending on your objectives, I can propose native development for each platform or hybrid development (React Native, Flutter) to share costs and accelerate timelines.

  • Do you offer maintenance services after launch ?

    Yes, I offer several maintenance packages to ensure the sustainability of your application: updates for new iOS/Android versions, bug fixes, performance improvements and small feature additions.

  • How to monetize my mobile application ?

    Several options are possible: initial purchase (paid application), in-app purchases (freemium), subscription (SaaS), advertising, or indirect model (tool supporting your main activity). I help you define the most suitable strategy for your target and business model.

  • How does publication on stores work ?

    I accompany you in publishing on the App Store (iOS) and the Google Play Store (Android). This includes preparing visuals, writing product sheets, configuring settings, as well as managing validations. The application can be published under your developer account or I can guide you to create it.

  • Will my application need a backend ?

    It depends on its features. If your application needs to store data, manage user accounts, payments or synchronization between devices, a backend will be necessary. I design secure and custom backends, adapted to your needs.

  • How do you guarantee data security ?

    Security is integrated at every stage of development. I apply best practices: encryption of sensitive data, secure authentication, protection against vulnerabilities, GDPR compliance, and regular security testing. I also advise you on writing the privacy policy.

  • Can you integrate advanced features ?

    Yes, I can integrate features such as: geolocation, push notifications, in-app payments, augmented reality, image recognition, messaging, offline mode, and much more. Each feature is developed according to platform standards.

  • How do you measure application success ?

    I integrate analytics tools (Firebase, Mixpanel, etc.) to track key indicators: number of active users, retention rate, session duration, user journey, conversionsâ€¦ You receive regular reports accompanied by recommendations to improve the application.

  • Will I be able to evolve my application later ?

    Yes, all my applications are designed to be scalable. You can contact me at any time to add new features or adapt the application to new needs. A quote will be proposed to you, and updates will be planned to limit the impact on your users.
